```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(reticulate)
```

```{python load packages and data, include=TRUE}

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

import argopy
import cmocean

wmo = 4902688
flt = argopy.DataFetcher(ds='bgc').float(wmo)
ds = flt.to_xarray()
ds.argo.canyon_b.predict(['NO3', 'pCO2'])

fig, axes = plt.subplots(3, 1, sharex=True, sharey=True)

ds.plot.scatter(x='CYCLE_NUMBER', y='PRES', hue='DOXY', ax=axes[0], cmap=cmocean.cm.dense, linewidths=0)
ds.plot.scatter(x='CYCLE_NUMBER', y='PRES', hue='NO3', ax=axes[1], cmap=cmocean.cm.matter, linewidths=0)
ds.plot.scatter(x='CYCLE_NUMBER', y='PRES', hue='pCO2', ax=axes[2], cmap=cmocean.cm.amp, linewidths=0)

axes[0].set_ylim((250, -10))

```
